Title: Ocean's Thirteen
Writer: Brian Koppelman, David Levien, George Clayton Johnson (characters), Jack Golden Russell (characters)
Actors: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Michael Mantell
Plot: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.
Production: Section Eight Ltd., Village Roadshow Pictures, Jerry Weintraub Productions, Warner Bros.
